alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nueces, northwestern San Patricio, northeastern Jim Wells and southeastern Live Oak Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mathis, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mathis, Lake City, San Patricio, Sandia, West Sinton, Argenta, Edroy, Lakeside, Lake Corpus Christi and Pernitas Point. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 22 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak
